description:
Come with me on a journey to achieving your dreams quickly. Where you will transform your life from mediocrity to greatness and become a purpose-driven woman who is living intentionally.

****Over 1800+ Students are already enrolled ****

****COURSE UPDATED IN DECEMBER 2015****

There is no manufacturer who releases his product into the marketplace without a well-defined purpose or function. â€œBefore I formed you in the womb I knew you, before you were born I set you apart; I appointed you as a prophet to the nations (Jer1:5niv). If the product is used in unintended ways, it will lead to accidents, breakdowns and frustrations.

  • Are you frustrated with the direction of your life?
  • Are searching for your purpose in life?
  • Are you wondering why you are here?
  • Is your life stagnant?
  • You know there's much more to you than meets the eye
  • You have a burning desire to be more and achieve more

If you are ready to BREAKTHROUGH to the NEXT-LEVEL, then this course is for you. You are fearfully and wonderfully made (Psa139: 14kjv) to fulfill a specific purpose and your role is to DISCOVER the purpose and walk in it.

After years of living in mediocrity, I went on a journey of self-discovery.

What I found were time-tested TRUTH that will elevate any average Joe from a life of mediocrity to fulfillment of destiny.

Your destiny is hidden under layers of decisions made by you or for your, life circumstances and situations. Until the layers are pilled back and the true YOU is revealed, your destiny is questionable.

JOIN TODAY to start uncovering your destiny

Many are called but few are chosen (Matt22: 14kjv). This journey is only for the chosen few who are BOLD and ready to put their FAITH to work.

All your emotions and methodologies will be tested. Your EXPECTATION will determine the RESULTS you get from taking this journey with me. Discovering your purpose is a personal commitment; your family and friends cannot help you. It's just YOU and the creator. For the earnest expectation of the creation eagerly waits for the revealing of the sons of God. (Rom8:19nkjv). SIGN-UP NOW your future awaits you.

It's a New Life. It's up to you to believe it, walk in it and your expectation shall not be cut-off.

Click the "take this course" button, top right, now ... your transformation is now

Thank you, Keroy King
title: Steps To Becoming a Purpose-Driven Woman
